Planetary Orbital Evolution due to Tides
Orbital evolution of two objects experiencing tides

1 #define BUILDING_LIBRARY
2 #include "SynchronizedCondition.h"
3 #include "BinarySystem.h"
4 #include "DissipatingZone.h"

6 namespace Evolve {
7 
8  SynchronizedCondition::SynchronizedCondition(int orbital_freq_mult,
9  int spin_freq_mult,
10  short deriv_sign,
11  bool primary,
12  unsigned zone_index,
13  BinarySystem &system) :
14  StoppingCondition(deriv_sign),
15  __orbital_freq_mult(orbital_freq_mult),
16  __spin_freq_mult(spin_freq_mult),
17  __primary(primary),
18  __zone_index(zone_index),
19  __zone((primary
20  ? system.primary()
21  : system.secondary()).zone(zone_index)),
22  __system(system)
23  {}
24 
25  std::valarray<double> SynchronizedCondition::operator()(
26  Core::EvolModeType
27 #ifndef NDEBUG
28  evol_mode
29 #endif
30  , const std::valarray<double> &orbit,
31  const std::valarray<double> &derivatives,
32  std::valarray<double> &stop_deriv
33  ) const
34  {
35 #ifndef NDEBUG
36  assert(evol_mode == Core::BINARY);
37  if(__system.number_locked_zones())
38  assert(orbit[0] == __system.semimajor());
39  else assert(std::pow(std::max(0.0, orbit[0]), 1.0 / 6.5)
40  ==
41  __system.semimajor());
42  assert(orbit.size() == (1
43  +
44  3 * __system.number_zones()
45  -
46  __system.number_locked_zones()));
47  assert(orbit.size() == derivatives.size());
48 #endif
49  double
50  m2 = __system.secondary().mass(),
51  semimajor = __system.semimajor(),
52  worb = __system.orbital_frequency(),
53  wspin = __zone.spin_frequency(),
54  dworb_dt = (__system.orbital_frequency(true)
55  *
56  derivatives[0]
57  *
58  Core::AstroConst::solar_radius);
59 
60 
61  unsigned angmom_ind = 1 + 2 * __system.number_zones();
62  if(!__primary) angmom_ind += (__system.primary().number_zones()
63  -
64  __system.primary().number_locked_zones());
65 
66  const DissipatingBody &body = (__primary
67  ? __system.primary()
68  : __system.secondary());
69  for(unsigned i = 0; i < __zone_index; ++i)
70  if(!body.zone(i).locked()) ++angmom_ind;
71 
72  double dwspin_dt = (
73  (derivatives[angmom_ind] - __zone.moment_of_inertia(1) * wspin)
74  /
75  __zone.moment_of_inertia()
76  );
77  if(__system.number_locked_zones() == 0)
78  dworb_dt /= 6.5 * orbit[0] / semimajor;
79 
80  stop_deriv.resize(
81  1,
82  (
83  (wspin * dworb_dt - dwspin_dt * worb)
84  /
85  std::pow(worb, 2)
86  *
87  __spin_freq_mult
88  )
89  );
90 
91 #ifdef VERBOSE_DEBUG
92  std::cerr << describe() << " angmom index: " << angmom_ind
93  << " worb = " << worb
94  << " dworb_dt = " << dworb_dt
95  << " wspin = " << wspin
96  << " dwspin_dt = " << dwspin_dt
97  << " adot = " << derivatives[0] / (6.5 * orbit[0] / semimajor)
98  << " has deriv = " << stop_deriv[0]
99  << std::endl;
100 #endif
101 
102 
103 #ifndef NDEBUG
104  if(
105  std::isnan((__orbital_freq_mult * worb - wspin * __spin_freq_mult)
106  /
107  worb)
108  ) {
109  std::cerr << "Synchronized value for zone " << __zone_index << "/"
110  << __system.primary().number_zones() << " for worb=" << worb
111  << ", wspin=" << wspin
112  << ", m'=" << __orbital_freq_mult << ", m="
113  << "__spin_freq_mult is NaN."
114  << ", semimajor=" << semimajor << std::endl ;
115  assert(false);
116  }
117 #endif
118  return std::valarray<double>(
119  (__orbital_freq_mult * worb - wspin * __spin_freq_mult) / worb,
120  1
121  );
122  }
123 
124  void SynchronizedCondition::reached(short deriv_sign, unsigned index)
125  {
126 #ifndef NDEBUG
127  std::cerr << "Synchronization reached: "
128  << "Expected sign: " << expected_crossing_deriv_sign()
129  << "sign: " << deriv_sign
130  << std::endl;
131 #endif
132  StoppingCondition::reached(deriv_sign, index);
133 #ifndef NDEBUG
134  std::cerr << "Now expected sign: " << expected_crossing_deriv_sign()
135  << std::endl;
136 #endif
137  }
138 
139  std::string SynchronizedCondition::describe(int ) const
140  {
141  std::ostringstream description;
142  description << (__primary ? "Primary" : "Secondary")
143  << " body, zone "
144  << __zone_index
145  << " satisfying "
146  << __orbital_freq_mult
147  << "(orbital frequency) = "
148  << __spin_freq_mult
149  << "(spin frequency)"
150  << ", expected crossing sign: "
151  << expected_crossing_deriv_sign();
152  return description.str();
153  }
